title: Understand
content: Being an analytical thinker with an acumen to solve business problems, I firstly understand my Clientâ€™s requirements, provide my inputs, ideas & improvements on the business front (only if the Clients is willing to hear it for free).

title: Develop a Plan
content: Keeping in mind, scalability & user experience I carry feasibility study about the required application & come up with the suggestion regarding the best fit tech-stack which includes choice of language, framework, architecture & database for the project.

title: Work
content: After the business team agrees regarding the tech-stack & freeze requirements, I start with my core coding.
